fields.name: Jollof
fields.description: Jollof rice is a reddish one-pot rice dish popular in many West African countries.

fields.name: Fried Rice
fields.description: African Fried Rice puts a spicy, flavorful spin on the traditional fried rice and is appealing on its own or served with a variety of other African foods.

fields.name: Efo
fields.description: Delicious stewed spinach made with fresh tomatoes, abanero peppers, onions, rapeseed oil, smoked salmon,  giant shrimp and more

fields.name: Ayamase
fields.description: Our absolutely delicious signature Ofada stew made from big bell peppers, abanero peppers, onions, assorted meat, organic palm oil, boiled eggs and locust beans.
